newsitem.title: FRANCE: SOCCER-TEAMS FOR FRANCE V ENGLAND.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-TEAMS FOR FRANCE V ENGLAND.

text.p: Teams for France v England in the Tournoi de France at the Mosson Stadium on Saturday:

France: 16-Fabien Barthez; 15-Lilian Thuram, 18-Bruno N'Gotty, 5-Laurent Blanc, 3-Pierre Laigle; 7-Didider Deschamps, 17-Patrick Vieira, 6-Youri Djorkaeff, 21-Marc Keller; 20-Nicolas Ouedec, 9-Christian Dugarry.
England: 1-David Seaman; 2-Gary Neville, 5-Gareth Southgate, 12-Sol Campbell; 17-David Batty, 6-Graeme Le Saux, 14-Philip Neville, 7-David Beckham, 8-Paul Gascoigne, 20-Ian Wright, 9-Alan Shearer.
